Package jisa.gui

Class Tabs

  • java.lang.Object
    • jisa.gui.JFXElement
      • jisa.gui.Tabs
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Container, Element
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeasurementConfigurator
    public class Tabs
extends JFXElement
implements Container
    A GUI container element for displaying multiple other elements as traditional-style tabs.
